# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_BITSCRATCH-VM_CPP_FILES
    "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/source/MicroBitTicker.cpp"
    "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/source/vm.cpp"
    "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/source/main.cpp"
    "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/source/lib.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_BITSCRATCH-VM_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")
set(YOTTA_AUTO_BITSCRATCH-VM_HEADER_FILES
    "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/source/MicroBitTicker.h"
)
# force dependency on the config header for header files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_BITSCRATCH-VM_HEADER_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_executable (bitscratch-vm
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_BITSCRATCH-VM_CPP_FILES}
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_BITSCRATCH-VM_HEADER_FILES}
)
set_target_properties(bitscratch-vm PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE bitscratch-vm)



target_link_libraries(bitscratch-vm
    microbit
)
